Livingston, John H. The psalms and hymns, with the catechism, confession of faith, and liturgy of the Reformed Dutch Church in North America (New Brunswick: Deare & Terhune)
Livingston, John H. The psalms and hymns, with the catechism, confession of faith, and liturgy of the Reformed Dutch Church in North America (New Brunswick: Deare & Terhune)
This copy owned by Dr. John B. Zabriskie (1805–1848) of Flatbush, with his signature on fly-leaf. Bookplate of his grandson, John B. Zabriskie.
